titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the New York State 1892 Census returns for Brooklyn's 15th election district 1973.231
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-08T14:50-0500

did.unittitle: New York State 1892 Census returns for Brooklyn's 15th election district
did.abstract: This collection consists of two volumes containing 1892 New York State Census returns from Brooklyn's 15th election district. For each name, the returns record various demographic data, including sex, age, color, country of birth, citizenship status, and occupation.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: The source and date of acquisition for this collection are unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1973.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); New York State 1892 Census returns for Brooklyn's 15th election district, 1973.231, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.
